Introduction
This topic contains information on authorization actions under the
Nehmer
stipulation, including
determining the proper survivor of a
Nehmer
class member for payment purposes
identifying the appropriate survivor of a
Nehmer
class member
actions to take when the appropriate survivor of a
Nehmer
class member cannot be located
requirement to document efforts taken to identify a potential payee
identifying other survivors of a
Nehmer
class member before awarding benefits to an identified payee
considering entitlement to additional allowances for a surviving spouse
awards to
Nehmer
class members who receive(d) military retired pay (MRP)
payment of Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) to the surviving spouse of a Veteran who died prior to January 1, 1993
authorization activity responsibility to determine the effective date of an award of DIC
awards of retroactive benefits of $10,000 or more to incompetent beneficiaries
applying a retroactive payment under the
Nehmer
court order to a debt
annotating an award of retroactive benefits under the
Nehmer
court order
, and
second signature requirement for award actions taken under the
Nehmer
court order
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Authorization Under the Nehmer Stipulation
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
